snippet: Christian Borle, an actor in NBC’s “Smash,” is also keeping a foot in the theater, playing a pirate in “Peter and the Starcatcher,” opening Sunday on Broadway.
abstract: Actor Christian Borle plays a Broadway composer in the NBC television series Smash and a pirate in the Broadway production of Rick Elice play Peter and the Starcatcher; Borle comments on experience of straddling Broadway and television worlds.
lead_paragraph: Christian Borle, an actor in NBC’s “Smash,” is also keeping a foot in the theater, playing a pirate in “Peter and the Starcatcher,” opening Sunday on Broadway.
